featured.text: He immediately rushed to his microscope and examined the burrs attached on his pants—feeling a lightbulb moment coming on.
What does the author mean by “a lightbulb moment” in the first paragraph? (A)

definition.zh_def: 一種用於照明的電器，通常由玻璃製成，內含發光的燈絲或發光二極體。
definition.en_def: An electric device that produces light, typically made of glass and containing a filament or LED.
definition.example: I replaced the burnt-out lightbulb in the living room.
